nodes.text: Rescue 2 was a Rescue Boat used by Rescue Flight to free civilians held by the Trade Federation.

In 32 BBY, Rescue 2 participated in a joint effort by Rescue Flight and Bravo Squadron to raid Trade Federation prison camps on the Solleu River. Rescue 2 went to Camp Two and loaded up all the prisoners. The Boat took on so many passengers that it became overloaded, preventing its engines from being turned to full power. Nevertheless, Rescue 2 and the two other Rescue Boats from Rescue Flight made it to the Europa Islands where they transferred their passengers to the freighter Mercatan.
